Grouped_Utterances: I think I’d like to explore my feelings of anxiety when it comes to work. Sometimes I feel overwhelmed by my responsibilities.

Yes, actually. I’ve been thinking about how much I miss traveling, especially after hearing about my friend’s trip to Japan. It made me want to plan something soon. It makes me feel happy and a bit anxious at the same time. I want to make sure everything goes smoothly. It’s understandable to feel a mix of emotions about travel. What do you think contributes to your anxiety about it? I think it’s the logistics. Planning flights, accommodations, and making sure I don’t miss anything important. It’s mainly deadlines and the pressure to perform well. I want to succeed, but sometimes it feels like too much.
Not really. I don’t want to seem weak or incapable.

It helps me stay grounded and focused. I feel more in control of my thoughts and emotions. Yes, like when I’m stuck in traffic. Instead of getting upset, I remind myself to breathe and stay calm. I’d feel relieved. It would show that they care about my well-being.

I try to make lists and break everything down into smaller tasks. It helps me feel more organized. Yes, I’ve been trying to stick to my routine. It really helps clear my mind, especially when I’m feeling overwhelmed.
